Dallin Wright

Software Engineer

My Projects


ManageMe

A project management tool built with Angular 14 on the frontend and ASP.NET Core 6 for the API with a sql server. Currently hosted with Azure, this project is an example of basic CRUD operations and List-Detail architecture.

This was my first full stack application built from scratch. There are definitley imporvements and more funcionalities I would like to add.


Golf Match

Another web application built with Angular 14 and ASP.NET 6. This Project was originally designed as a user matching app, but has taken a turn to become a social app for golfers. This project features CRUD operations and user authentication. When completed it will have a Postgres database.

This was my first project dealing with app users and password security. It also allows users to upload photos using Cloudinary.

A little bit more about me

I live in Gilbert, Arizona and I am married to the greatest person ever. I have an almost one year old baby that brings so much joy into my life and meaning into my work.

I am a computer science student at WGU and am set to graduate next summer. In addition to technology I have great people skills and have worked previously in the mortgage and real estate industry.

When I am not working or with my wonderful family, you can probably find me on the golf course. I started golfing about a year ago and I am hooked. I also love running, backpacking, and playing guitar.
